type CompositeDataReader<'Source, 'LastTransformer (requires 'LastTransformer : null and 'LastTransformer :> ITransformer)> = class interface IDataReader<'Source>

Docs.summary: This class represents a data reader that applies a transformer chain after reading. It also has methods to save itself to a repository.
